content.title: 1. Mobile
content.author: Didier Fanchon
content.subtitle: Mobilité
content.paragraph:
The proliferation of mobile access via terminals (smartphones, tablets, pocket-pc) means reviewing the traditional design and ergonomic screens for fixed width. Since 2010 new technologies gathered under the name of Responsive Design allow to adapt automatically the display and contents of a website to the size of the screen on which it is consulted.

Rubedo is the first CMS to consider the evolution of the web within design tools back office. Creating a "responsive" or "adaptative" site has never been easier.
